verses.roman:
svarūpa-ādi bhakta-ṭhāñi ājñā māgiyā
vārāṇasī āilā bhaṭṭa prabhura ājñā pāñā

synonyms: svarūpa-ādi—headed by Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī; bhakta-ṭhāñi—from the devotees; ājñā māgiyā—asking permission; vārāṇasī āilā—returned to Vārāṇasī; bhaṭṭa—Raghunātha Bhaṭṭa; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; ājñā pāñā—getting permission.
translation: After taking permission from Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu and all the devotees, headed by Svarūpa Dāmodara, Raghunātha Bhaṭṭa returned to Vārāṇasī.
